name: Block Puzzle Box
description:
A collection of addictive Block Puzzle games featuring 3 different block types: Square, Hexa & Triangle.
Choose between 12 boards of different shapes and sizes and find all the star.

How to Play:
Slide the blocks from below onto the board. Each time you build a full line, it disappears.
The game ends once the board is too crowded to fit the remaining pieces - How many points can you get?
